title: Hotblood!: A Centaur in the Old West
description: "Hotblood!" follows the adventures of James Evander Leicester Rook (a total washout Civil War vet who happens to be a centaur), Asa Langley (America’s most irreverent steel industry icon and Rook’s employer), and a great deal of money. The year is 1871.
author: Toril Orlesky
